name: iQQ Partner A Client (CLI002)

values.description: Partner A Client - Maps to CLI002. Get from: terraform output -json cognito_partner_clients | jq -r '.partner_a.client_id'
Get from: terraform output -json cognito_partner_client_secrets | jq -r '.partner_a'
Partner A API Key - Tagged with clientId=CLI002. Get from: terraform output -raw partner_a_api_key_value
Business Client ID (automatically extracted from API key)

description:
Partner A client environment with CLI002 preferences:
- Only allows Client Insurance and Route 66 (whitelist)
- Expected result: 2 quotes (Client Direct, Route66)

IMPORTANT: This is a template file. Copy to postman-environment-partner-a.json and fill in the credentials.
